title: Cyber week sale: this platform gives you lifetime access to major AI models all for $29.97
content:
Macworld

While ChatGPT was major when it was first released, it’s not the only (or best) AI model around anymore. GPT-4 is innovative, but it’s not the best model for every task you need help with. Instead of paying separate fees for the major AI models, why not own them for life?

That’s exactly what 1minAI does, combining GPT-4, Mistral AI, Gemini, Midjourney, and so many others in one place for only $29.97 (reg. $234).

While you’ll have lifetime access to multiple AI models, the only catch is that there’s a finite amount of content you can create each month. You’ll get 1,000,000 credits each month (1 credit = 1 generated word or image), but if you need more, log in daily to score 15,000 additional free credits (up to 450,000 free credits per month).

If you’re working against a deadline but have a conflicting meeting, use 1minAI (ChatGPT-4o, specifically) to join work calls as you crunch out numbers. You can also have AI perform other tasks, like generating revenue reports or handling customer inquiries on your small business’s website, to save you hours of time.

With its Midjourney integration, you can have AI generate, edit, and enhance images for your site or an infographic for your company’s Instagram account. Need help with an SEO project? Let one of the AI models do keyword research for you.

A lifetime of the major AI models is yours when you get 1minAI for just $29.97. Act now while supplies last!

Only $29.97 at Macworld until December 15 at 11:59 p.m. PT. 

StackSocial prices subject to change.
